name: Alignment
description: Secure stakeholder buy-in before project starts. Create pitch service agreement and signoff documents. Optional - skip if building your own product or small trusted team.

name: Project Brief
description: Define product vision positioning competitive analysis and success criteria. The North Star for all design decisions.

name: Trigger Mapping
description: Map business goals to user psychology. Create personas with driving forces and feature impact analysis. The secret weapon of WDS.

name: Platform Requirements
description: Define technical boundaries that inform design. Platforms integrations constraints and risks. Know your boundaries before designing within them.

name: Outline Scenarios
description: Define user journeys to design. Scenarios are journeys not pages. Connect to personas and driving forces.

name: Conceptual Sketching
description: Fast rough visual exploration. Multiple entry points: hand sketch AI generation inspiration or discussion.

name: Storyboarding
description: Sequence the user journey through screens. Map entry points transitions success states and error paths.

name: Conceptual Specifications
description: Document every design decision. What why how and content for every element. Nothing left to interpretation.

name: Functional Interface Components
description: Identify reusable patterns across specifications. Extract components that appear 3+ times with consistent behavior.

name: Visual Design
description: Transform specifications into visual prototypes. Use Stitch AI and Figma to make designs real.

name: Design System Modes
description: Manage components based on project mode: None Building Library or Existing. System grows organically from design work.

name: Design Delivery
description: Validate specifications and package for development. Freyas final step before handoff to Idunn.

name: Agentic Development
description: Build iteratively with documented agent dialogs. Design one thing build it review iterate. Capture decisions for context.

name: Testing
description: Verify implementation matches specifications. Browser-based comparison of built product against design specs.

name: Product Evolution
description: Continuous improvement for living products. Capture feedback connect to trigger map update specs deliver test. Your work compounds.
